content: times k to m sm k to 1 before m m1r k1 sm k1 m1l * repeat * 2 times k to ds k ds as 1 st k3 turn r4 ws mds p to m sm * repeat * 5 times p to ds p ds as 1 st p3 turn repeat r3 rs - r4 ws 3 more times r11 rs mds k to 1 before m m1r k1 sm k1 m1l * repeat * 2 times k to m sm you are now at the bor and short row are complete 2 unworked ds remain when you come to them work each ds as 1 st you now have 156 / 160 / 160 / 164 / 168 sts back & front 46 / 48 / 48 / 50 / 50 sts sleeves 32 / 32 / 32 / 32 / 34 sts first raglan increases for the front back and sleeves r1 k to 1 before m m1r k1 sm k1 m1l * repeat * 4 times k to eor 8 sts increased r2 k all repeat r1 r2 23 / 24 / 26 / 28 / 28 more times you now have 348 / 360 / 376 / 396 / 400 sts back & front 94 / 98 / 102 / 108 / 108 sts sleeves 80 / 82 / 86 / 90 / 92 sts second raglan increases for the front and back r1 k to 1 before m m1r k1 sm k to m sm k1 m1l * repeat * 2 times k to eor 4 sts increased r2 k all repeat r1 r2 4 / 5 / 6 / 5 / 9 more times you now have 368 / 384 / 404 / 420 / 440 sts back & front 104 / 110 / 116 / 120 / 128 sts sleeves 80 / 82 / 86 / 90 / 92 sts seperate body and sleeves r1 k to m rm place next 80 / 82 / 86 / 90 / 92 sts sleeve sts on the stitch holder or scrap yarn rm co 12 / 14 / 16 / 16 / 18 sts using any method you want * repeat * 2 times k to eor you now have 232 / 248 / 264 / 272 / 292 sts for the body body knit the body in the round until it measures approx 38 / 39 / 40 / 41 / 42 cm from the armhole or until your desired length minus 6 cm for the ribbing ribbing change to 3 5mm us 4 100 cm circular needles r1 k1 p1 * repeat * to eor repeat r1 until ribbing measures approx 6 cm bind off using italian bind off or any other stretchy bind-off method sleeves slip 80 / 82 / 86 / 90 / 92 sleeve sts on to the 4mm us 6 40 cm circular needles video tutorial https //youtu be/taztzqvupn8 si=rwfxmrfsq9xsyq4i from the center of the underarm co
